Set.SearchSql: SELECT CONF_TAG, CONF_TAG FROM EWA_CONF ORDER BY CONF_TAG

Set.Sql:
SELECT CONF_TAG , CASE WHEN conf_parent_tag = '' THEN '' ELSE conf_parent_tag +' - ' END + CONF_TAG as name
FROM EWA_CONF ORDER BY CONF_TAG

Set.Name: OnPageLoad SQL
Set.Sql: SELECT * FROM EWA_CONF WHERE 1=1 ORDER BY CONF_PARENT_TAG, CONF_TAG

Set.Name: OnTreeNodeDelete SQL
Set.Sql: DELETE FROM EWA_CONF WHERE CONF_TAG=@CONF_TAG

Set.Name: OnTreeNodeRename SQL
Set.Sql: UPDATE EWA_CONF SET CONF_TAG=@CONF_TAG WHERE CONF_TAG=@CONF_TAG

Set.Name: OnTreeNodeNew SQL
Set.Sql: INSERT INTO EWA_CONF(CONF_PARENT_TAG, CONF_TAG, [object Object], CONF_TAG) SELECT @CONF_PARENT_TAG, @CONF_TAG, A.LVL, B.ORD FROM (SELECT CASE WHEN MAX([object Object]) IS NULL THEN 1 ELSE MAX([object Object]) + 1 END LVL FROM EWA_CONF WHERE CONF_TAG=@CONF_PARENT_TAG) A, (SELECT CASE WHEN MAX(CONF_TAG) IS NULL THEN 1 ELSE MAX(CONF_TAG) + 1 END ORD FROM EWA_CONF WHERE CONF_PARENT_TAG=@CONF_PARENT_TAG) B; SELECT * FROM EWA_CONF WHERE CONF_PARENT_TAG=@CONF_PARENT_TAG AND CONF_TAG=@CONF_TAG

Set.Name: OnPageLoad SQL
Set.Sql: SELECT A.* FROM EWA_CONF A WHERE 1=1 AND A.CONF_STATUS = CASE WHEN @EWA_RECYCLE='1' THEN 'DEL' ELSE 'USED' END order by conf_cdate desc

Set.Name: OnFrameDelete SQL
Set.Sql: UPDATE EWA_CONF SET CONF_STATUS='DEL' WHERE CONF_TAG = @CONF_TAG

Set.Name: OnFrameRestore SQL
Set.Sql: UPDATE EWA_CONF SET CONF_STATUS='USED' WHERE CONF_TAG = @CONF_TAG

Set.Name: OnPageLoad SQL
Set.Sql: SELECT A.* FROM EWA_CONF_DICT A WHERE 1=1 AND A.DICT_STAUTS = CASE WHEN @EWA_RECYCLE='1' THEN 'DEL' ELSE 'USED' END AND (CONF_TAG = @CONF_TAG OR @CONF_TAG IS NULL) AND (PARA_NAME = @PARA_NAME OR @PARA_NAME IS NULL) ORDER BY CONF_TAG, PARA_NAME, DICT_NAME
